example.eg: This lift has a lot of force and can lift a heavy truck.
example.egtrans: 这个起重机力量很大，可以举起一辆沉重的卡车。

example.eg: The force of the wind caused the ball to fall to the side.
Many people think that religion is a force of good in the world.
example.egtrans: 许多人认为宗教是世间一股向善的力量。

example.eg: Our country's military includes the army and the air force.
example.egtrans: 我国的军事力量包括陆军和空军。

example.eg: Military forces landed on the island and restored order.
example.egtrans: 部队登岛，恢复了岛上秩序。

example.eg: The police forced the door.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 强行打开, 用强力克服阻力而促使

example.eg: Beth didn't want to eat anything, but her parents forced her.
example.egtrans: 贝丝不想吃任何东西，但她父母却逼迫她吃。

example.eg: His father forced him to take out the rubbish.
example.egtrans: 他爸强迫他把垃圾拿出去丢掉。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 逼迫自己做某事, 强迫自己做某事

example.eg: Some force is driving me to telephone him.
example.egtrans: 某种力量驱使我给他打电话。

example.eg: Her argument had a lot of force.
The company's sales force has done great work this year.
example.egtrans: 公司的销售团队今年干得很不错。

example.eg: The metal couldn't withstand the force, and eventually broke.
example.egtrans: 金属没法承受那样的压力，最终断裂。

example.eg: Through the power of persuasion, we were able to force the issue through.
He didn't want to admit it, but he forced the words out.
Police forced the squatters out.
example.egtrans: 警察将那些非法占用者都赶了出去。

example.eg: France has a larger air force than the UK.
example.egtrans: 法国空军比英国规模大。

example.eg: Steve joined the armed forces in 1995.
Costa Rica has no armed force.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 武装部队, 武装力量

example.eg: I tried to lock him out but he broke down the door with brute force.
Soldiers generally operate by force.

dsense.name: come into force, come into effect

example.eg: The new law does not come into force until February of next year.
The actress was the driving force behind the renovation of the theatre.
The new immigration law passed last week by the legislature, will enter into force January 1st of next year.
When the elevator was stuck, he had to force the doors apart to get out.
Her hunger strike was cut short after they force-fed her.
example.egtrans: 他们强迫她进食，导致她的绝食抗议提前中止了。

example.eg: The guards force-fed the prisoner food.
example.egtrans: 守卫们强迫囚犯吃东西。

example.eg: The regime force-fed propaganda to the people.

dsense.name: force feeding
dsense.guideword: (use of a tube to force nourishment)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 强行进食, 强迫进食

example.eg: There would be no pâté de foie gras without the force feeding of geese.
The shipping insurance does not cover piracy or other acts of force majeure.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不可抗力, 人力不可抗

example.eg: The force of gravity on the Moon is lower than on Earth.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 重力, 地心引力, 万有引力

example.eg: That little boy is a force of nature!
Marcus isn’t naturally good with numbers. It was really difficult for him to get a degree in math, but he succeeded through sheer force of will.
The jar lid was sealed tightly so he had to force it open.
He was forced out of retirement when they cut off his pension.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 迫使...离开，驱逐...离开, 迫使...放弃

dsense.name: a force to be reckoned with, a power to be reckoned with

example.eg: When Angela gets angry, she is a force to be reckoned with.
The army forced their way into the city.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 强行挤入, 强行挤进, 挤过去

example.eg: She attempted to keep him outside of the house, but he forced his way in.
To make progress you have to force yourself to practice every day.
The Highway Code does not have the force of law.
According to the laws currently in force, you must wear a safety belt when driving a car.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 生效的, 有效的, 实施中的

example.eg: His friends came out in force to support him in the race.
Ray's colleagues came out in full force to wish him well on his last day at the office.
The size of the labor force increases when school closes for the summer.

dsense.name: magnetic field, magnetic intensity, magnetic field strength,magnetizing field, magnetizing force

trans_examp.trans_cn: 销售人员, 销售队伍

example.eg: The UN sent a security force to keep the peace in the region.
The Navy sent a task force to counter the attack.
The Mayor formed a task force to wipe prostitution off the streets of the city.
example.egtrans: 市长成立一个特别行动小组来清理城市大街小巷的卖淫活动。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 特别行动小组, 特别任务小组

example.eg: John Coltrane's saxophone solo on "My Favorite Things" was a tour de force.
The company gave the whole workforce a bonus at Christmas.
example.egtrans: 圣诞节时公司给全体员工发了奖金。

dsense.name: workforce, work force
dsense.guideword: (all workers in a region) (整个国家、地区的)

example.eg: The country's workforce needs to increase in order to provide for an ageing population.
example.egtrans: 要供养老龄人口，该国的劳动人口必须增加。
